text: She Was the Other is a 1914 American silent comedy film featuring Mabel Paige and Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Ed Lawrence - The Chief * Oliver Hardy - Cutie (as Babe Hardy) * Mabel Paige - Helen ==See also== * List of American films of 1914 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==External links== * Category:1914 films Category:American films Category:American silent short films Category:1914 short films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 comedy films Category:Films directed by Arthur Hotaling Category:Comedy short films
title: She Was the Other
